PS: Booking.com take care of relocation and visa sponsorship if needed. general interview process goes as Hackerrank test, Recruiter phone interview, Technical phone interview, onsite interviews.

I work as a backend developer for more than a year at booking.com during this year I personally grow in both technical and non technical skills, the work environment is challenging but also safe.

We are a data driven Company rely heavily of A/B testing. To have more insight about what we are working on have a look at our tech blog: http://blog.booking.com/ If you have any questions or you would like me to refer you, feel free to send me an email at mahmoudadelemam92@gmail.com
